name: Wake Me Up (noakishere)
description:
Best experience is in full screen and headphones.

Wake Me Up is an experimentation of the developers' vision towards art, music, narration and gameplay. 

This demo was created during the Game Endeavor game jam.

Team:

Art/Game Design:Helia Golmohammadi
Programming/Music: Kamyar Karimi

January 2021
